title: El Hazard: The Wanderers (El-Hazard: The Wanderers)
synopsis: High school science-whiz Makoto Mizuhara is working on his newest project in preparation for the school festival, alongside his best friend Nanami Jinnai. Nanami's brother and Makoto's lifelong rival, the unscrupulous student council president Katsuhiko Jinnai, is under scrutiny for mishandling the school festival planning and is convinced that Makoto is plotting to steal his position. One night, as Makoto and Nanami are taking a break with their teacher Masamichi Fujisawa, Jinnai sneaks into the science lab and sabotages Makoto's device, which suddenly opens a portal that flings all four of them into another world!
characters: ['Jinnai, Katsuhiko', 'Fujisawa, Masamichi', 'Mizuhara, Makoto', 'Venus, Rune', 'Jinnai, Nanami', 'Ifurita', 'Shayla, Shayla', 'Relryle, Alielle', 'Diva', 'Mann, Afura']
